attributes.action: Transport should not be more than £1
attributes.additional_details: It is too much money going on transport just because of changing the zone. Many people cant afford it.
attributes.background: Transport should be free for all the students. Those who are not students, transport should not be more than £1 for them. Moreover, zone thing should not exist.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the price of local public transport are a matter for individual transport operators and relevant local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund free public transport for children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616644

Fund free public transport for all: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623220
